headline: Exercice de conjugaison
instructions: There are multiple questions. Choose the right answer. (only one answer is correct)

messages.text: Maybe you should try again. You did not answer any question correctly!
Well. better than nothing. But you can do better.
Good job. but less than a half sounds a little bit like you are still in holiday.
Excellent! But can you become a master of conjugation?
You are a legend! You did it all correctly.
